message:
Is there a react.js fan tell me why anyone should use react.js
It give only one feature and said we are the fastest :/ ????
The v in MV* !!! 
Where are the ng-if ng-repeat filters ....... Route?

data.message:
I am a Reactjs user but not fan! (yet) .. I bet you won't find a fan ... they rarely exist... 

Anyway, as u know Ractjs is v but with different behavior .. instead of writing js on html to enable templating .. it took the html and put it on the Javascript code as JSX .. so if you want to make if condition or a loop/iterator .. you will use normal javascript statments like if, for or functions like "each()" "filter()" .. etc. ((Using jsx)) 

For routes u need to use "react-route" component to be able to write the router components ğŸ˜ƒ .. 

To make a complete framework .. you may need to use Redux or Flux with it. But it does not follow the mvc pattern .. so you will struggle with it in the begining to understand the architecture.

I hope if this answer would help u :)
